meanings.definition: A sum of money that is borrowed and expected to be paid back with interest.
meanings.sent1: I took out a loan to buy a new car.
meanings.sent2: The bank approved my loan application.
meanings.sent3: My piggy bank offered me a loan with a high interest rate!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a loan of hope in my darkest hour.
meanings.sent5: The loan from my friend saved me from financial trouble.

meanings.definition: To lend something temporarily to someone.
meanings.sent1: Can you loan me your pencil for the test?
meanings.sent2: I will loan you my umbrella until you find yours.
meanings.sent3: I decided to loan my brother my video game console.
meanings.sent4: She will loan her expertise to the project team.
meanings.sent5: The library will loan books to students for research purposes.
